author: USA TODAY, Janet Loehrke and Jim Sergent, USA TODAY
title: Steps to cutting your own hair during the coronavirus shutdown
description: COVID-19 might keep us in our homes for several more weeks. Here's how to maintain your mane while sheltering in place.
content:
Many of us are weeks into mandatory shutdowns and orders to stay home, and there's a growing problem on the top of our heads.
On average, we've all added a half-inch of hair during the first month, and our next trip to the hairstylist or barber could be in w… [+2533 chars]
